TopicTitle: can we have parachute folding when the chutes touch the ground? Ksp 2 suggeston

Articles.Content: If you are some one like me then you get kinda mad when you try to to a realistic mission then when you land the parachute just poofs out of existence. so it would be cool to have folding parachutes in ksp 2
welcome to the forums! I think it's a great idea at first, but it might complicate things. I guess you can make the same excuse of why antennas and solar panel parts break off.
Even if it looks kind of lumpy in the way simple bones and jiggle physics do in like 2000s era games, i can picture this being a solid idea for a mod if it isn't in the game.
